attributes.action: ban gifted deposits on house purchases.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In an effort to make the housing market more transparent and to reduce fraud in the sector, gifted deposits have been shown to, at best, cause confusion and at worst defraud private investors into paying more than a property is actually worth (ref: BBC Panorama programme, 4 Feb 2008)
